Name: Plaguebringer
Description: Infestation specialist. Can use the Corrosive Parasite and Heart Devourer.

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to move to the target area or follow the target unit. Moving units will not engage enemies.
Root.Name: Move

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to cancel all orders and stop moving.
Root.Name: Stop

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to stay where they are and attack enemies that are within range. Units will neither chase down enemies nor move to engage.
Root.Name: Hold Position

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to patrol between their current position and the target area. Units will attack enemies and move to engage nearby enemies.
Root.Name: Patrol

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to move to the target point, fighting nearby enemies along the way. Targeting a unit with the Attack command orders that it be attacked until it is destroyed.
Root.Name: Attack

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to move to the target area or follow the target unit. Scan-moving units will not engage enemies.
Root.Name: Scan Move

Root.Tooltip: Drops the current order without performing it, and allows you to select a different order.
Root.Name: Cancel

Root.Tooltip: Buries the unit underground. Burrowed units are unable to attack, but they cannot be seen without detection. This unit may move while burrowed.
Root.Name: Burrow

Root.Tooltip: Stretch a tentacle to the target unit, applying 4 stacks of parasite effect and dealing damage equal to the stacks on the target unit every 3 seconds. The Plaguebringer cannot take any other action while channeling.**Channeled ability**
Root.Name: Heart Devourer

Root.Tooltip:
Plaguebringer's parasite is an active effect.

Add 'corrupted' debuff for 10 seconds. Unit with 'corrupted' debuff will gain 2 stacks of parasite every second. Inflecting Parasite on the target for the first time will grant biomass 2 times of the target's supply.
Root.Name: Corrosive Parasite

Root.Tooltip:
"When I was a larva, I used to be lifted into the air by Protoss Air Superior Fighter for half an hour. If I wasn't too huge now, I would fly up and bite all their ships myself!"

All Zerg forces can become air units and target air units. Unable to burrow.
Root.Name: Graviton Reversal

Root.Tooltip:
"Today, we are all Templars!--That's how Daelaam keep warriors tireless in combat."

Become invulnerable in a short time upon taking fatal damage and restore 15% life. Only occur 1 time per 240 seconds.
Root.Name: Guardian Shell

Root.Tooltip:
"Curiously, this Chrono Boost device is much smaller than others. Why don't they use it to boost troops?"

The unit operates 15% faster. Can use it to initiate a chrono boost, additionally operating 45% faster in 5 seconds.
Root.Name: Chrono Boost

Root.Tooltip:
"I thought that the Protoss would stop eliminating if I hid in a steam valve. Then my Queen showed me in action that eliminating them all can we get peace."

Permanently Cloaked. Use it to become super cloaked and immune to damage in 5 seconds.
Root.Name: Cloaking Field

Root.Tooltip:
"It's a brilliant idea to gather psioinc energy and strike. Just hope that Amon will let off my baby Hydralisks."

Have a chance to release a psi storm at the target location when attack hits.
Root.Name: Psionic Storm

Root.Tooltip: Fire a corpse parasite at the target enemy. When the target dies, it will deal damage to nearby enemy units equal to a percentage of the target's maximum health. This percentage value is the same as the number of stack of parasites.
Root.Name: Corpse Explosion

Root.Tooltip: Unit under the 'corrupted' effect from Plaguebringer will be controlled by Niadra for the remaining duration if its stack of parasite is above 40.
Root.Name: Neural Parasite

Behaviors.Tooltip: This unit is in an accelerated state.
Behaviors.Name: Chrono Boost

Behaviors.Tooltip: This unit is in a permanently cloaked state.
Behaviors.Name: Cloaking Field
